Maximize Your Auto Auction Success with Our Comprehensive Browser Extension

Unlock the full potential of Copart, IAAI, and Manheim auctions with our advanced browser extension, designed to transform the way modern car business owners and brokers navigate through auto auctions. This indispensable tool streamlines your auction experience, offering a suite of professional features directly in your browser for unparalleled efficiency and insight.

Key Features Include:

Multi-Language Support: Access our service in English, Georgian, Russian, and Ukrainian, Spanish, and Chinese making it easier for a diverse range of users to navigate and utilize our tools effectively.

Advanced Auction Insights: Get detailed information on lots without needing to log in to auction sites, including insurance details, real-time customs calculator prices, and the seller's minimum expected price.

Enhanced Viewing Experience: Enjoy dark mode, one-click HD image loading, full-size image viewing, and automatic bid eligibility status reveal to enhance your browsing and decision-making process.
Comprehensive Price and Delivery Calculator: Quickly calculate the purchase price, including auction tax, shipping costs, and customs clearance, with the option to set personalized pricing for different users.

VIN Insights: Access a vehicle's history, including previous auction outcomes, VIN decoding, average price, specifications, and the cost of additional expenses, all with the convenience of one-click operations.

Efficient Account Management: Limit bids by various criteria, track user activity, and manage multiple auction accounts through our secure integration portal at www.carhunters.com
Professional Tools for Brokers: Features designed specifically for brokers, including real commission, transportation prices, and open VIN codes, to enhance your professional operations.

Notifications and Scheduling: Stay updated with Telegram Bot notifications about auction starts, bid overruns, and organize your trade schedules with the "My Trades" feature.
Why Choose Our Extension?

Our plugin not only simplifies your workflow by providing crucial lot information and seamless integration into Copart, IAAI, and Manheim platforms but also offers unique insights like seller reserves, insurance details, and comprehensive cost calculations. With support for real-time data, including the most affordable prices for CarFax reports and a robust customs calculator, our extension empowers you to make informed, professional decisions with ease.

Whether you're calculating delivery costs, exploring detailed vehicle histories, or managing your auction accounts, our tool is designed to elevate your car business to the next level. Experience the future of auto auction management and controlâ€”optimize your operations, save time, and increase your success rate in the competitive auto auction market.
